description:
Welcome to the Kindle eBook Publishing Free Preview course.

Just like the title says this course is a Free Preview of the full Kindle eBook Publishing course. It includes an overview of what you will learn in the full course.

This course is designed for the person new to publishing who wants to create passive income by publishing eBooks on Amazon Kindle.

By the end of this course you will have a good understanding of whether publishing Kindle eBooks is right for you and whether you want to deepen your knowledge with the full course. Then you can put your Kindle eBook publishing into high gear and begin creating a growing stream of passive income.

You'll be introduced to:

  • How to write an eBook
  • How to format an eBook
  • How to enter your eBook details into Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP)
  • How to create an eBook cover
  • How to promote your book using KDP Select

You'll also get access to coupons for big discounts off the full course Kindle eBook Publishing - How I Make $1500/mo w/No Marketing in the final section.

If you're ready to learn how to publish your own eBooks and start creating passive income click on the Take This Course button and let's get started.
title: Introduction to Amazon Kindle eBook Publishing for Beginners
